archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.3b: b) an approved remit of responsibility for handling security events and incidents, which may be to forward required actions to responsible IT teams (catch and despatch), coordinate actions or act to remediate issues
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
